data.title: Introduction to the Handbook on UAVs
data.meta_description: This chapter presents an overall introduction and overview of the handbook, including each section objectives along with summaries of the chapters included in each section. The goal of this chapter is twofold: (i) familiarize the reader with the contents of each...
